author: Rick Spilman
content: My guess is that the cruise ships’ pod propulsion aft and the thrusters forward could do considerable damage to the canal bottom and seawalls.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I agree with Roger, whilst the Cruise ships create very little wash compared to the fast launches in the lagoon they are so out of context and the possibility of one having steering problems and damaging historic buildings like in Turkey is too much of a risk.
